text: The Nevada Lieutenant Governor is an elected office in the U.S. state of Nevada. They are elected for 4 year terms. The 37th and current Lieutenant Governor is Stavros Anthony (Republican) since 2023. ==Living former lieutenant governors of Nevada== Lt. Governor Lt. Gubernatorial term Date of birth (and age) Bob Miller 1987-1989 Sue Wagner 1991-1995 Lorraine Hunt 1999-2007 Brian Krolicki 2007-2015 Mark Hutchison 2015-2019 Kate Marshall 2019-2021 Lisa Cano Burkhead 2021-2023 ==Other websites== * Nevada Lieutenant Governor
title: Lieutenant Governor of Nevada
